_meanings:
{@--1@} Unsteady, fickle, 
unsettled; {#째stimitamUQaGUrRannayanaH#} <ls>U. 3</ls> with
unsteady eyes; <ls>Ku. 4. 28.</ls>

{@--3@} Faithless, loose in
morals or moral conduct, dissolute
({#vyaBicArin#}); {#nArIrhatvA'navasTitAH#}  
<ls>Ms. 11. 139.</ls>

{@--4@} Unable to stay or 
remain; {#prasTitaM tamanavasTitaM priyAH#}  
<ls>R. 19. 31</ls>; {#째tvaM, 째sTitiH#} instability, 
looseness of conduct.
